testcase.name: A manager would like to check all of their employees' requests
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: A manager would like to check all of their employees' requests Given A manager is logged in ... passed in 1.757s And The manager is on the profile page ... passed in 0.933s When A manager clicks on the Reimbursement Requests link ... passed in 0.532s Then The manager is redirected to the Reimbursement Requests page ... passed in 0.006s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: A manager would like to change the status and message for a request
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: A manager would like to change the status and message for a request Given A manager is logged in ... passed in 1.819s And The manager is on the profile page ... passed in 0.908s Given A manager is on the Reimbursement Requests page ... passed in 0.565s When The manager changes the status for a request ... passed in 1.215s And The manager adds an optional message ... passed in 0.018s And The manager clicks the form button ... passed in 3.904s Then The manager is redirected to the Reimbursement Requests page ... passed in 0.005s And The updates are reflected for the particular request ... passed in 0.942s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: A manager would like to create a new employee account
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: A manager would like to create a new employee account Given A manager is logged in ... passed in 1.856s And The manager is on the profile page ... passed in 0.896s Given A manager is on the Sign Up page ... passed in 0.585s When The manager inputs all the new account's information ... passed in 0.160s And The manager clicks on the signup button ... passed in 2.032s Then The manager is redirected to the Profile page ... passed in 0.007s And The new employee is listed ... passed in 0.942s And The manager can delete the new employee from the list ... passed in 0.492s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.system-out:
